title: Please help! Any identities using Avenir?
content:
Can anyone help me?

I’m trying to list as many brands as possible using the typeface [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010745/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Avenir) in their identities. This is for a student project and all help well be greatly appreciated. So far I have the city of Amsterdam and the BBC. Any others?

 [‹ Tech Illustration Billing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010745/http:/typophile.com/node/32795 "Go to previous forum topic") [Helvetica is 50 years old: International Herald Tribune ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080503010745/http:/typophile.com/node/32783 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Brett Stabler
